query: CREATE TABLE user_to_sign_up(username VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, password TEXT NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,  /* recovery email OR recovery phone number */ recovery_email TEXT, recovery_phone_country_code CHAR(2), recovery_phone_number VARCHAR(15),  otp_hash TEXT NOT NULL, otp_expiry TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL);
